ScriptExecutionParameter.description: The arguments passed in to the execution

ScriptExecution.description: An instance of a script executed by a user - custom or AVS

properties.description: The properties of a script execution resource

scriptCmdletId.description: A reference to the script cmdlet resource if user is running a AVS script

hiddenParameters.description: Parameters that will be hidden/not visible to ARM, such as passwords and credentials

failureReason.description: Error message if the script was able to run, but if the script itself had errors or powershell threw an exception

retention.description: Time to live for the resource. If not provided, will be available for 60 days

submittedAt.description: Time the script execution was submitted

startedAt.description: Time the script execution was started

finishedAt.description: Time the script execution was finished

provisioningState.description: The state of the script execution resource

output.description: Standard output stream from the powershell execution

information.description: Standard information out stream from the powershell execution

warnings.description: Standard warning out stream from the powershell execution

errors.description: Standard error output stream from the powershell execution

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page if any

ScriptSecureStringExecutionParameter.description: a plain text value execution parameter

secureValue.description: A secure value for the passed parameter, not to be stored in logs

ScriptStringExecutionParameter.description: a plain text value execution parameter

value.description: The value for the passed parameter

principalId.description: The principal ID of private cloud identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID associated with the private cloud. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: The type of identity used for the private cloud. The type 'SystemAssigned' refers to an implicitly created identity. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the Private Cloud.
